name: Cartomancy (The Stuck Pixel)
description:
Please play browser version in fullscreen!

You are a magician stuck in a dream. You get a fresh hand of cards after completing each room. Shoot cards, and play cards to affect your stats and/or the enemies!

Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

Programmer: https://itch.io/profile/mushroommantoad
Level Designer: https://kristenstuffs.itch.io/
Lead Artist: https://pretender8.itch.io/
Artist: https://misceris.itch.io

Sound sources:

 https://freesound.org/people/ShortRecord/sounds/514162/
https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack
https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/8-bit-music-booster-pack
